channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many Christmas trees dumped outside my building, 12th January
item.description:
Many Christmas trees have been dumped outside my building and they are now making it difficult to get my car out without damaging the paintwork. They are a fire hazard

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fortescue Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping, 12th January
item.description:
Reisdent called report more flytipping of al sorts of items has been dumped outside 40 Iris Avenue. He complained that this happens continuously and if we where to in stored CCTV the council would make a profit from the fines. Please can we inspect and monitor this road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iris Avenue, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Our bin has been taken and dumped with broken furniture, 12th January
item.description:
After bins were collected on 3rd January, we noticed our bin was missing. Then we saw it on the opposite pavement. Someone had pulled off the label we put on all our bins but luckily I had also marked it with permanent marker. We looked inside and saw it was full of broken up wood and was too heavy to move. I emailed the waste disposal team Bexley but got no reply. I asked a council worker collecting bus stop bins and he recommended this service. We need our bin back please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Battle Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped garbage by commercial/residential property, 12th January
item.description:
There are dumped items here every single day. It is truly foul. Clothes, food bins, other furniture items just spread across the pavement. PLEASE can this be investigated and removed quickly.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Road, London

item.title: Christmas trees strewn all over Beatty Road, 12th January
item.description:
It’s January 12th. There are uncollected Christmas trees everywhere on the street. I understand wanting people to pay for their garden refuse, but most people do not have a garden and no way to bring trees to collection. We pay insanely high council taxes.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beatty Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
